text: Cac nguoi khong mac toi neu cac nguoi tim kiem thien loc cua Thuong Đe (Allah) cua cac nguoi (qua viec mua ban đoi chac trong thoi gian lam Hajj). Nhung khi cac nguoi voi va roi (thung lung) 'Arafat (đe đi Muzdalifah), hay tan duong Allah tai Mash'ar Haram (o Muzdalifah). Va hay tan duong Allah đung theo (cach) Ngai đa chi dan cho cac nguoi boi vi qua that truoc đay cac nguoi la nhung ke lam đuong lac loi
